articles.author: ROB GILLIES Associated Press
articles.title: American senators rip Trump’s Ukraine peace proposal at international security conference in Canada - ABC News
articles.description: American senators panned a U.S. peace proposal on Ukraine at a international security conference in Canada, with one calling it one of the most serious geopolitical mistakes of his lifetime
articles.content: HALIFAX, Nova Scotia -- American senators panned a U.S. peace proposal on Ukraine at an international security conference Saturday, with one calling it one of the most serious geopolitical mistakes o… [+3474 chars]
